title: Looking for SUPP main to join ranked 5 team
body:
Silver + pref
Able to be on Sunday/Monday nights
Can download teamspeak
Does not rage
17+

Add me in game and post here with your current Division

replies.body:
Silver 5 

main support. Good with Janna, Lulu, Leona and Annie. Available on Sunday and Monday in the evenings.
Low Silver division , keen to play support, play a large variety of supports. Pretty cool guy and Sunday/Monday nights are my best availability :) Can play other nights as well

competent support with large champ pool
added

I main jungle, but do play support a fair bit in norms, I like Blitz and Leo :)
Added you in game, I was low silver last season :)
